pages.cookies: Cookie Policy - Fantasy Blow We use cookies! By continuing to use our website, you agree to the use of cookies in accordance with our Privacy Policy. Accept and continue More about cookies Fantasy Blow Cookie Policy At Fantasy Blow, we use cookies and similar technologies to provide the best possible experience when using our website and a What are cookies? Cookies are small text files that may be stored on your computer or mobile device when you visit a website. They help the site remember information about you, such as preferences and settings, to improve your user experienc Analytics cookies These cookies collect information about how you use our website, such as which pages you visit most often and what errors may occur. This data helps us to improve our website, for example by detecting and resolving errors, and also provides us with information about which pages and features of our website are most popular. How we use cookies? We use cookies for the following purposes: Analytics: We use cookies to collect anonymous information about how users interact with our website to improve its functionality and conte Authentication: Cookies help us identify you as a registered user and give you access to your account. Personalization: We use cookies to remember your preferences and settings to offer you a more personalized user experience. Your options You can always change your cookie settings by blocking or deleting cookies by following your browser's instructions. However, please be aware that disabling cookies may affect the functionality and availability of some features of our website. Managing cookies You can manage the cookie settings on your device, including blocking or deleting them. Please note that blocking cookies may affect your experience of using the website and some features may not be available. You can find instructions on how to manage cookies in your browser settings. Acceptance of Terms and Conditions By continuing to use our website, you agree to the use of cookies in accordance with our Privacy Policy. Privacy Policy Disclaimer Terms of Use Cookies FantasyBlow@gmail.com Payment partners Disclaimer Use of this app implies your agreement to our Terms of Use and Privacy Policy. Please familiarize yourself with them before use. © 2024 Fantasy Blow. All rights reserved.

pages.index: Welcome to Fantasy Blow: Play fantasy cricket and win exciting prizes! We use cookies! By continuing to use our website, you agree to the use of cookies in accordance with our Privacy Policy. Accept and continue More about cookies Welcome to the world of Fantasy Strike! Immerse yourself in the magical atmosphere of cricket and fantasy adventure. Join us on an exciting journey through the world of sports and fantasy! Fantasy Kick is an innovative platform where you can not only follow the games of your favorite teams, but also be a part of exciting competitions, show your knowledge of sports and win exciting prizes. I accept Privacy policy Get app 4.5 APP RATINGS 1 Million DOWNLOADS 1K+ Daily CONTESTS About us We are a team of enthusiasts united by a shared passion for sports and fantasy. At Fantasy Impact, we strive to create a unique space where sports meets magic and reality meets fantasy. We strive to make sporting events even more exciting and accessible to everyone. Our goal is to give players the opportunity to not only watch the games, but to become part of this exciting process by demonstrating their knowledge and skills, competing with friends and winning exciting prizes. Our Mission Passion: We are passionate about sports and fantasy, and our app is built with love for both worlds. Innovation: We are constantly looking for new ideas and features to make our platform better and more unique. Community: We value every player and strive to create a friendly and inspiring community of sports and fantasy fans. Join us and dive into the world of Fantasy Impact where sports meets magic! Why play Fantasy Blow Game? Skill Enhancement: Raise your statistical level by closely studying players, their recent performance and game conditions. Participating in a fantasy cricket game continuously develops analytical skills and the ability to make informed decisions. Real-time integration: The game is more than just an active process. As the actual match progresses, so does your score. This is an opportunity to feel part of the dynamic action. Material Rewards: With the right strategies and insight, you can reap significant rewards in games where you can earn money. Increased knowledge: Gain a deeper understanding of cricket. Explore not only key players but also new talents, their roles and team dynamics. Versatility: A variety of games - from T20s to ODIs to Test matches - ensures there's always something interesting to play. Tweak your strategy depending on the format of the game. Available games: With the advent of fantasy cricket apps, the game has become even easier to play. Whether it's a commute or a break, the game is always at your fingertips. Increased competitive spirit: The opportunity to lead a league or outdo friends in private leagues fuels the sense of competition, motivating players to improve their strategies. Learning opportunity: Mistakes become lessons. Over time, you learn to read the game better, to determine when to pick certain players and how to do so. Entertainment: Fantasy cricket offers not only an activity, but also pure fun. The joy of seeing your chosen player perform successfully in a real match is simply inexpressible. Preview Fantasy Blow App Explore our app that offers an immersive fantasy cricket experience at your fingertips anytime, anywhere. Our app provides a convenient and interactive way to participate in games, create your own teams and compete for exciting prizes. Join Fantasy Impact today and start your exciting journey in the world of sports and fantasy! How To Play? 1 Sign Up Sign Up With Your Phone Number And Start Making Teams On Fantasy Blow. 2 Choose Your Match To Enter a Match, Just Tap on the Match You Wish to Form Your Teams In 3 Craft Your Special Team of 6 Players Select Any 6 Players You Prefer to Shape Your Team 4 Play and Progress The Higher the Level of Your Selections, the Bigger the Prizes 5 Cash Out and Revel! Receive Your Earnings Instantly in Your Bank Account. Information Collection We may collect various types of information including your name, email address, information about your device, location and other data when you use our app and website. Use of Information We use the information we collect to operate our app and website, to improve the user experience, to process payments (if necessary), for analytics, and for security and safety purposes. Disclosures to Third Parties We do not sell, rent or trade your personal information with third parties without your consent, except as required by law. Data Security We take all reasonable steps to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, use or disclosure. Your Rights You have the right to request access to, correct, delete or restrict the processing of your personal information.
